snippet: The Securities and Futures Commission seeks $245 million, accusing the firm of failing to disclose foreign exchange losses in a case dating to 2008.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Futures Commission seeks $245 million, accusing the firm of failing to disclose foreign exchange losses in a case dating to 2008.

headline.main: Hong Kong Regulator Sues Chinese Giant Citic
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Regulator Sues Chinese Giant Citic
